Contains information about the ClickHouse server's build options.

Columns:

<!--AUTOGENERATED_START-->
<!--AUTOGENERATED_END-->

**Example**

```sql
SELECT * FROM system.build_options LIMIT 5
```

```text
┌─name─────────────┬─value─┐
│ USE_BROTLI       │ 1     │
│ USE_BZIP2        │ 1     │
│ USE_CAPNP        │ 1     │
│ USE_CASSANDRA    │ 1     │
│ USE_DATASKETCHES │ 1     │
└──────────────────┴───────┘
```
